version_description: With this version we have started to offer 1 week free trial before starting 2-months subscription, enjoy it!
With this version we have started to offer 1 week free trial before starting 2-months subscription, enjoy it!

We have added weekly subscription option besides some improvements and bug fixes.
We keep on developing Photolift everyday!

We have added weekly subscription option besides some improvements and bug fixes.
We keep on developing Photolift everyday!

This new version includes some bug fixes and new improvements
Enjoy using Photolift !

This new version includes some bug fixes and new improvements
Enjoy using Photolift !

The new version of Photolift is now offering great features.

You no longer have to adjust hair, beard, style or any accessories on your face, because it fits automatically!
This new version works in iOS 11 or higher, does sizing and fitting automatically by recognizing the faces on photos, and makes easier for you to find the best style that suits you.

We have also added a new face shaping feature.

We hope you’ll use it with pleasure!

The new version of Photolift is now offering great features.

You no longer have to adjust hair, beard, style or any accessories on your face, because it fits automatically!
This new version works in iOS 11 or higher, does sizing and fitting automatically by recognizing the faces on photos, and makes easier for you to find the best style that suits you.

We have also added a new face shaping feature.

We hope you’ll use it with pleasure!

With this new version, we have fixed some issues and updated our platform for performance improvement.
We hope you’ll use it with pleasure!

With this new version, we have fixed some issues and updated our platform for performance improvement.
We hope you’ll use it with pleasure!

The new version of Photolift is now offering great features!

Now you can change eye color in your face photos magically by picking from many different color contact lenses! Just use reshape tool in face menu.

On the other hand we have added photo enhancement tools like magic remover which enables you to remove unwanted objects in your photos and cut out tool to remove background of your photo and change with one of the many background templates offered in the app!

Besides, from now on you will be able to pixelate or apply blur on selected parts of your photos.

Along with many improvements on performance and user experience, there is one more great feature: You will be able to share your photos in your Instagram story directly!

Enjoy using Photolift!

If you love please don't forget to rate us on App Store!

With this new version, we have started to offer one-time payment option for lifetime unlimited access to all content and services.
Also we have increased free trial period from 1 week to 1 month for weekly subscription option!
Enjoy using Photolift...

We've made some "behind the screen" performance fixes for a better, faster experience.
We hope you will use it with pleasure!
If you like Photolift, please don't forget to rate us on App Store!
